title: Sports or Recreational Dingbats
content:
I have search around for dingsbats that would look modern and sophisticated, but the ones I have come across do not look very clean or sophisticated. Does anyone where I can obtain excellent sports or recreational dingbats?

 [‹ Looking for a "Modern, Corporate, and Profesional" typeface...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080920053558/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36389 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font for legal contract? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080920053558/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36321 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Capnhud

comments.content:
